links: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
prog: (PARI) v=[]; for(n=1,200,v=concat(v,floor(cotan(Pi/(n+1))))); v(PARI) { default(realprecision, 50); for (n=1, 1000, write("b062299.txt", n, " ", floor(cotan(Pi/(n+1)))) ) } \\ _Harry J. Smith_, Aug 04 2009
author: _Amarnath Murthy_, Jun 19 2001
